Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrtd WB via Promontory Dr, South Shore Dr & 67th: EB via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette & Promontory Dr due to blockage nr 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/South Shore due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Westbound buses will operate via Promontory Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Fulton
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Fulton, Desplaines, Milwaukee and Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Fulton, Desplaines, Milwaukee, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 47th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
